track.name: December 4th
comments:

Maybe you'll love me when I fade to black
that bass
If you can't respect that your whole perspective is whack.

Possibly my favourite ever Jay-Z song; I love this video of his live performance of the song at Madison Square Garden http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hz83WwMW8TI&list=FLtgzuSmXu4Qj7Xt5Bfabxsw&index=1&feature=plpp_video

Happy Birthday Hov
This beat is just....damn.
it's so awesome having your birthday as a song.
happy b-day JAY-Z!
my birthday today.
Hello December 4th. I wonder what beyonce be doing today.
Just Blaze blast it
